text: Locksley Wellington "Slide" Hampton (April 21, 1932 - November 18, 2021) was an American jazz trombonist, composer and arranger.Larkin, Colin. The Guinness Encyclopedia of Popular Music, Guinness, page 1818, (1995) As his nickname implies, Hampton's main instrument was slide trombone, but he also occasionally played tuba and flugelhorn. Hampton taught at Harvard, artist-in- residence in 1981,Harvard Jazz Band, 1981 the University of Massachusetts, DePaul University in Chicago, and Indiana State University.
